Data Scientist Career Roadmap.advice: Learn the basics of statistics and mathematics, including probability, linear algebra, calculus, and mathematical modeling. Start with online courses such as Khan Academy's Mathematics and Stanford University's Probability and Statistics.
Data Scientist Career Roadmap.title: Step 1

Data Scientist Career Roadmap.advice: Familiarize yourself with popular data science tools and technologies like Python, R, SQL, pandas, NumPy, scikit-learn, TensorFlow, Keras, and PyTorch. Practice with projects on Kaggle or GitHub.
Data Scientist Career Roadmap.title: Step 2

Data Scientist Career Roadmap.advice: Develop expertise in machine learning algorithms and deep learning techniques by taking courses like Andrew Ng's Machine Learning and Stanford University's Deep Learning Specialization.
Data Scientist Career Roadmap.title: Step 3

Data Scientist Career Roadmap.advice: Learn data visualization tools like Tableau, Power BI, or D3.js to effectively communicate insights to stakeholders. Practice with real-world datasets on Kaggle or UCI Machine Learning Repository.
Data Scientist Career Roadmap.title: Step 4

Data Scientist Career Roadmap.advice: Stay up-to-date with industry trends by attending conferences, meetups, and workshops. Read blogs and articles from top data science publications like KDnuggets, Data Science Central, and Towards Data Science.
Data Scientist Career Roadmap.title: Step 5

Data Scientist Career Roadmap.advice: Build a strong portfolio showcasing your projects and achievements in data science. Participate in competitions like Kaggle's Data Science Bowl or Google Analytics Competition to demonstrate your skills.
Data Scientist Career Roadmap.title: Step 6
